Froth Web Application Enviorment for Cocoa Developers

Templating

Froth supports a simple yet expandable templating language built on top of Matt Gammels excelent templating code MGTemplate.
See WebLayoutView and WebActionView for templating details

Resource Mapping

Froth Supports a powerful resource mapping system for mapping web app actions to a specific template based on the extention. This can be used to render xml, json, binary versions of a item without changing the controller layer.
